Class OutputSlot<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.Slot<T>
      • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.OutputSlot<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class OutputSlot<T>
extends Slot<T>
    An output slot declares an output of an Operator.

      • followOutputRecursively

        public static <T> java.util.Collection<OutputSlot<T>> followOutputRecursively​(OutputSlot<T> outputSlot)
        Recursively follow the given outputSlot.
        Parameters:
        outputSlot - the OutputSlot to follow
        Returns:
        the interfacing OutputSlots (either belong to a top-level Operator or occupy an InputSlot) that represent given outputSlot
        See Also:
        Operator.getContainer(), OperatorContainer.followOutput(OutputSlot)

      • collectRelatedSlots

        public java.util.Set<OutputSlot<T>> collectRelatedSlots()
        Collects all OutputSlots that are related to this instance via OperatorContainers.
        Returns:
        all the matching OutputSlots

      • isFeedforward

        public boolean isFeedforward()
        Returns:
